title: Incident Recognition and Reporting
description: Learn to identify security incidents and understand ClearTriage's reporting procedures. Covers incident categories, response timelines, and information spillage awareness.
objectives: Recognize what constitutes a security incident at ClearTriage
Understand incident categories and required response times
Know exactly who to contact and how during an incident
Identify and report information spillage scenarios
Preserve evidence properly without attempting to 'fix' issues
